gov.nih.nci.ncia.resultset
Class RemoteResultSetManager

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.ncia.resultset.RemoteResultSetManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteGridNode, QueryResultSet
public class RemoteResultSetManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryResultSet, RemoteGridNode

This class provides the access point for getting lists of images, studies and patients from a remote instance of the NCIA. It utilizes the NCIAQueryServiceBroker to handle the requests. IMPORTANT: Each method call currently has a time out specified in the code that can later be turned into a System property. Please look at each method closely to determine how exactly how this timeout may effect expected behavior.

getPatientList

public java.util.List<gov.nih.nci.ncia.dto.PatientDTO> getPatientList(DICOMQuery query)
                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
Takes a DICOMQuery and returns a list of patients from the specified URL when the RemoteResultSetManager was instantiated. Currently a 3 second timeout is specified for this call, and should be adjusted to fit the various specifics of the environment in which it is deployed. (This timeout will later be turned into a system property as soon as we get a chance)

Specified by:
getPatientList in interface QueryResultSet
Parameters:
query -
Returns:
List the list of patients available from the remote node
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
